name: Lightning QR code scanner : QR code reader

Bar code scanner app is an ultimate Bar code reader app free to scan QR code and Bar code for any Android device. Enjoy all the benefit by scanning QR code and Bar code from everywhere to access promotion and coupon .  This QR code reader app free is granted with camera permission only . If you are very concerned about personal privacy , this is right free QR code scanner app you need. It is safe and fully compatible with Android 4.x or above.   Bar code scanner is widely used to decode QR code & bar code types such as ISBN, EAN, UPC , data matrix and others.   QR code reader with zoom feature , easy to decode small or far away QR code.  If you are concerned about safety , this Lighting qr code scanner for Android and Bar code scanner is the only one QR code reader you needed. not only simple , but also free.  Key Feature : -- Robust decoding rate. Move camera to focus on qr code and Bar code object is the only things to do.  -- Take appropriate action. To scan QR code , you can search product info or browse the website even connect WiFi without password typing.  -- History You can export all link via e-mail or reuse the link.  -- Flashlight Darkness ? not worry . Just turn on Flashlight function  -- Zoom Easy to scan QR code for android With Zoom In & Zoom Out feature.   Supported code type : Bar-code , QR code , flash code.
